GRACE 1000 Dataset

Source: R/data.R
grace.Rd

grace dataset from Hosmer et al.

grace

Format

id

Identification Code

days

Follow up time.

death

Censoring indicator. 1 = Death. 0 = Censored.

revasc

Revascularization Performed. 1 = Yes. 0 = No.

revascdays

Days to revascularization after admission.

los

Length of hospital stay (days).

age

Age at admission (years).

sysbp

Systolic blood pressure on admission (mm Hg).

stchange

ST-segment deviation on index ECG. 1 = Yes. 0 = No.

Source

ftp://ftp.wiley.com/public/sci_tech_med/survival

References

Hosmer, D.W. and Lemeshow, S. and May, S. (2008) Applied Survival Analysis: Regression Modeling of Time to Event Data: Second Edition, John Wiley and Sons Inc., New York, NY

Contents
